name: Coffee Break (itch) (LumpyJ)
description:
An office simulator that has everything you miss about going to work:

  • Looming project deadline!
  • Pile of dishes in the sink!
  • Fixing a broken printer!
  • Talkative rodent co-workers!
  • Free coffee!

Gameplay is about 30 minutes. 

Click here if you're having issues running the game on mac.
